name: FX Intraday Bollinger-VWAP Mean Reversion
description: Intraday mean-reverting strategy for major forex pairs using 20-period Bollinger Bands and VWAP. Buys when price recovers back inside the lower band on above-average volume; sells on symmetrical conditions at the upper band. Exits when price touches VWAP or reaches a 0.25 % take-profit. Risk per trade set to 1 % of equity with a fixed 15-pip stop beyond recent swing. Designed for conservative intraday traders; all positions flattened by session end.
